title: Phinn-signal
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108201623im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ouronlyhope.jpg)

Whenever [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108201623/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe) trademark policy is questioned, whenever build issues become too technical, or whenever [David Lemon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108201623/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Lemon) is in danger the Phinn-signal lights up the night sky allerting [Thomas Phinney](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108201623/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%20Phinney) to the [typorati](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108201623/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typorati)'s plight.

First used 4 April 2006 here - [http://typophile.com/node/19012](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108201623/http:/typophile.com/node/19012 "http://typophile.com/node/19012")

Other sightings...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108201623im_/http:/typophile.com/files/danphinnsignal1.jpg)
author: Si_Daniels
